## mergedeep variable

Recursively merge two collections and returns new merged collection

**Signature:**

```typescript
mergedeep: <T = ISerializableObject | ISerializableArray>(colOne: ICollection<T>, colTow: ICollection<T>) => ICollection<T>
```
